name: 1 Decision (Early Demo)
description:
Very early demo build of an app I'm hoping to finish in my spare time in-between assignments, etc. this coming academic year.

Purpose of publishing is only to demonstrate the format of levels / stories as I'm reaching out for short stories from the community (see at bottom of post) and as such this demo only features a single story found in the "demo campaign". 

Some buttons do nothing (but won't cause crashes), UI may undergo severe changes in development, this was just a quick and nasty build.

If you would like to submit a story to be featured, please head to Submit a Story to Feature in "1 Decision" - General Discussion - itch.io to read more.

*edit - I am aware that for some reason on mobile devices the main menu's title is displaying lower than it should, I may try to address this soon - in the meantime everything displays correctly on PC browsers.
